text: I am very, very excited about the World Cup. I think that England is going to win because we have the best team, including Phil Jones. I am going to watch as many of the matches as possible. I cant wait for Russia vs. Saudi Arabia, which is being dubbed by some as The Clash Of The Great Human Rights Defenders Who Also Play Incredibly Good Football. I think the top scorer will be Lionel Neymar. I am incredibly anxious about the quality of illegal streams here in South Africa. I want nothing but crisp HD but thats wishful thinking. I wish you all the merriest merry World Cup and look forward to us celebrating Englands glorious victory together via WhatsApp.
